    Class AppCanvas

    AppCanvas Class provides canvas for drawing commands to be displayed on a bitmap

    AppCanvas(int, int)

    new instance of appcanvas class create a new bitmap and graphics object to allow for drawing on the bitmap with the specified bitmap dimensions
